movie.title: Magma: Volcanic Disaster
movie.description_intro: When a volcano expert becomes convinced that a cataclysmic natural disaster is about to unfold, a volcanologist Professor John Shepherd and his graduate students believes that recent unexplainable volcanic activity as all of the volcanoes in the world are going to erupt and kill every living thing on the planet! They try to convince the government that their theory is true not a joke while also trying to figure out how to stop it before time runs out!
movie.description_full: When a volcano expert becomes convinced that a cataclysmic natural disaster is about to unfold, a volcanologist Professor John Shepherd and his graduate students believes that recent unexplainable volcanic activity as all of the volcanoes in the world are going to erupt and kill every living thing on the planet! They try to convince the government that their theory is true not a joke while also trying to figure out how to stop it before time runs out!

movies.title: After the Flames: An Apocalypse Anthology
movies.title_english: After the Flames: An Apocalypse Anthology
movies.title_long: After the Flames: An Apocalypse Anthology (2020)
movies.summary: Presenting seven stylish and suspenseful short tales which have been beautifully woven into one thrilling feature film. The specially selected stories which have been included in this feature are from award winner filmmakers from across the globe and stand as a celebration of the creativity and talent of today's independent filmmakers.
movies.description_full: Presenting seven stylish and suspenseful short tales which have been beautifully woven into one thrilling feature film. The specially selected stories which have been included in this feature are from award winner filmmakers from across the globe and stand as a celebration of the creativity and talent of today's independent filmmakers.

movies.title: The Jungle Book
movies.summary: Abandoned after an accident, baby Mowgli is taken and raised by a family of wolves. As the boy grows older, the wise panther Bagheera realizes he must be returned to his own kind in the nearby man-village. Baloo the bear however thinks differently, taking the young Mowgli under his wing and teaching him that living in the jungle is the best life there is. Bagheera realizes that Mowgli is in danger, particularly from Shere Khan the tiger who hates all people. When Baloo finally comes around, Mowgli runs off into the jungle where he survives a second encounter with Kaa the snake and finally, with Shere Khan. It's the sight of a pretty girl however that gets Mowgli to go to the nearby man-village and stay there.

movies.title: Get Rich or Die Tryin'
movies.summary: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.
movies.description_full: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.
movies.synopsis: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from crime to pursue his passion, rap music.

movies.title: Martin & Margot or There's No One Around You
movies.title_english: Martin & Margot or There's No One Around You
movies.title_long: Martin & Margot or There's No One Around You (2019)
movies.summary: Martin and Margot have been writers since they could write and lovers since the poet, La Bestia, brought them together. They have decided to travel through Guatemala to search for him in an old rickety land rover in a constant need of repair, with a low budget that they cannot afford. What begins as an adventure, soon takes a downward turn with an unexpected pregnancy that changes their perspective of one another and threatens their purpose. Amid their internal chaos and frenzied writing they are soon confronted with responsibility they cannot run away from, and are faced with choices that may tear them apart in a way that neither Margot's level headedness, nor Martin's optimism can fix.
